data.title: Finger Laced Crown WORLD PREMIERE : Cinema : Civic Theatre of Allentown
data.text:
Finger Laced Crown

On June 22nd we at Civic Theatre are rolling out the red carpet for Living Proof Pictures WORLD PREMIERE of their newest feature film Finger Laced Crown! Join the cast & crew and be the first to see this film shot in the Lehigh Valley with before it begins its festival circuit across the country and around the world. Formal dress optional-- get all done up and fancy or keep it casual.

Doors open at 5:30pm for a cocktail hour. Chat with the cast, scope out some of the artwork featured in the film, grab a drink and network—AND take copious pictures!

630pm acquire your refreshments, popcorn, candy… more booze and find your seats.

7pm Writer/Director Brandon C. Lay takes the stage to welcome you all and introduce the film.

Following the film there will be a fifteen-minute talkback/Q&A lead by Kate Hughes with the director Brandon C. Lay, leading lady Torez Mosley and featured artist Tyrone Webb.

Tickets are 25$ if purchased in advance or 30$ the day of the event.

(note: this film is unrated, however it contains strong language, sexual content, and adult themes not suitable for children)
